title: The Who rocks America: 1982 American Tour
brief_description: This video presents a live performance at the Maple Leaf Gardens, Toronto, of the famous British rock band, The Who, purportedly on their final tour of their career. The Who’s music spans two decades, producing such acclaimed albums as “Tommy” and “Quadrophenia”. This enduring and legendary band perform some of their greatest works including “Pin Ball wizard”, “My Generation”, “Long live rock” and many more. The Who consists of Roger Daltrey, Pete Townshend, John Entwistle and Kenney Jones with Tim Gorman on keyboards.
